title: Rage Of Angels- The Devil's New Tricks(Japan Edition)2016
description:
Rage Of Angels- The Devil's New Tricks(Japan Edition)2016 

February 26th 2016 sees the release of the follow up to the Rage Of Angels debut release â€˜Dreamworldâ€™.

For those who are unfamiliar with the band, this is the side project & brainchild of keyboard & guitarist Ged Rylands who also serves his time tinkling the ivories with the mighty Tyketto.

Unlike the eponymous 2013 first release, this album sets out its stall with all lead vocals being capably handled by Rob Moratti (ex SAGA).

Kicking off with the aptly titled â€˜Rage Of Angelsâ€˜ Iâ€™m immediately hit with a heavy wall of Purplesque overtones and searing guitars.
